Information about Catfish Doctor

Catfish Doctor is an Android-based Expert System Application with disease diagnosis function in catfish, this application is made to give information on catfish farmer about disease type, disease cause, way of treatment and prevention way on catfish disease.
Catfish Doctor version 1.0
Next
Back
CATFISH DOCTOR
Welcome to the Catfish Doctor app!
Please select the menu by pressing the upper left corner button on the Main Menu, which consists of noble diagnostic menu, disease data, symptom data and history of disease
On the list of catfish diseases can be clicked and will bring up detailed information
INFORMATION

Disease history is empty!
Done
Maybe you mean the disease below
Processing the diagnosis
Aeromonas hydrophylla
Fierce catfish killer, enter after fish stress or injured or after infection from other germs
Bleeding on the skin - Weak - Dark skin - Rough skin - Hard to breathe
Attack of Bacteria

Prevention: Maintaining water and environmental quality, do not make catfish stress and injury, vaccine at the age of 2 weeks / antibody around the age of 6 weeks, the form of immunity through high protein and ideal density

How to treatment: Replace water with fresh and cold fresh water or by giving Terramycin 50 mg / kg of fish / day for 7-10 days or giving Sulphonamid 100 mg / kg fish / day 3-4 days and all mixed with feed
Aeromonas punctata
Weak - Lost appetite - Scalp infection, back body, gills and fins
Disease that attacks the catfish seeds, but also attack the adult catfish but the symptoms do not seem clear
Preventive measures: Maintain water and environmental quality or provide antibiotics and probiotics according to dose

Method of treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water or by immersion in Oxytetracycline HCI 25-30 mg / kg fish / day for 7-10 days or give Sulfamerazine 100-200 mg / kg of feed for 1-3 days
Bintik Putih (White spot)
Diseases caused by protozoa of the Lchthyphyirius multifillis type. This disease is commonly found in freshwater fish, but in many catfish attack on catfish seeds
Attack of the Parasite
Weak - Often appear to the surface - White spots appear on the fins and gills - Fish rubs his body against a hard object
Preventive measures: Maintain water and environmental quality and adjust its accurate density

Method of treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water, separate the sick catfish and then satisfy for 2-3 days or infected fish soaked into Formalin 25 / m3 mixture with Malachyte green oxalate (MGO) 0.1 g / m3 for 12 - 24 hours, then given fresh water
Columnaris
Attack on catfish at a hot temperature of about 20 degrees Celsius
Bleeding in the flesh - Ulcers on the skin - Bleeding on the skin
Preventive measures: Maintain water and environmental quality or provide antibiotics and probiotics according to dose
Method of treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water or by immersion into Oxytetracycline solution 10 ppm for 30 minutes or give Sulfisoxzole 100 mg / kg per day for 10-20 days
Edwardsiella
Diseases that attack on fresh fish and sea fish with optimal temperature for its development around 35 degrees centigrade
Dark skin, Ulcers on the skin - Bleeding on the skin - Side eyes and body protruding - Small wound on the skin
Preventive measures: Maintain the quality of water and the environment or by destroying diseased fish by being buried or burned
How to treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water or by sowing Sulphanamide 100-200 mg / kg per day for 4 consecutive days at the start of the pool
Pseudomonas hydrophylla
Diseases that attack catfish all sizes, almost similar to Aeromonas hydrophylla and commonly found in soil, water and rotten fish
Ulcers on the skin - Bleeding on the skin - Weak - Skinny - Loss of appetite
Preventive measures: Maintaining water and environmental quality, Providing Vaccine at 2 weeks / antibody around 6 weeks, reducing stocking density and quarantining catfish disease
Method of treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water or by immersion in Oxytetracycline HCI 25-30 mg / kg fish / day for 7-10 days
Tuberculosis
The disease is caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium fortoitum that attacks all ages in catfish
Dark skin - Stomach swell - Liver spots
Preventive measures: Maintain water and environmental quality or provide antibiotics and probiotics according to dose
How to treat: Replace water with fresh and cold fresh water, quarantine catfish disease or treat with Oxitetracyclin solution mixed into 0.5 mg / kg feed
White mushrooms
Head, gill cover and fins overgrown with fine threads like cotton - In eggs covered with yarn like cotton
The disease is caused by the fungus Saprolegnia, this disease attacks on fish and its eggs, grows Saprohyte on wounds in cold places
Attack of the Mushroom
Preventive measures: Maintain the quality of water and the environment or provide careful handling so that catfish do not hurt or give antibiotics periodically

Method of treatment: Fish soaked in a solution of Malachyte green oxalate (MGO) 2.5-3 g / m3 water for 30 minutes and eggs soaked into 0.1-0.2 ppm Malachyte green oxalate (MGO) solution for 1 hour or 5-10 ppm for 15 minutes
Itchy
This disease is caused by the protozoa of Trichodina sp. which attacks the catfish seeds on the skin and fins
Weak - Skinny - Fish rubs itself against hard objects
Precautions: Maintain water quality and the environment or reduce its density

Method of treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water or by immersion in Formalin 150-200 ml / m3 solution for 15 minutes or immersion into 0.1 g / m3 Malachyte green oxalate (MGO) solution for 12-24 hours
Trematoda
Diseases caused by Gyrodactylus sp. and Dactylogyrus sp. which attacks the high density catfish seeds
Dark skin - Skinny - Fish rubs itself against hard objects - Fins fall out
Preventive measures: Maintain water and environmental quality, decrease water levels and reduce fish density

Method of treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water or by immersion in a 250 cc / m3 formalin solution of water for 15 minutes or immerse in Methyline blue 3 g / m3 water solution for 24 hours
Lernea sp.
Diseases that attack fish from seed to mother by sucking liquid food from the hosts body
There are protozoa that stick and thrust themselves on the gill cover, fins or eyes - The gill cover, fins or eyes are injured
Preventive measures: Maintain water quality and the environment, provide antibiotics and filter water entering the pond
Method of treatment: Replace water with fresh and cool fresh water or by immersion into a salt (NaCl) solution of 20 g / l for 5 minutes
